reviewText: (VHS Video) Grades K-4.  Irene Bedard, the recognized voice of Disney's Pocahontas, narrates this journey through American history created especially for children. This program recounts the story of pilgrims and the voyage of the Mayflower to Plymouth Rock, the Mayflower Compact, Squanto and the first Thanksgiving, and life in colonial Williamsburg. Part of the American History for Children Video Series, providing children with a balanced portrayal of U.S. history.
